VLT Pack Maven Plugin
Last Published: 2012-12-13  | Version: 1.0-SNAPSHOT
VLT Pack Maven Plugin
Project Documentation
  • Project Information
  • Project Reports

vltpack:upload-dependencies

Full name:

net.adamcin:vltpack-maven-plugin:1.0-SNAPSHOT:upload-dependencies

Description:

Upload dependencies representing vault packages to the configured CQ server

Attributes:

  • Requires a Maven project to be executed.
  • Since version: 1.0.
  • Binds by default to the lifecycle phase: integration-test.

Optional Parameters

Name Type Since Description
autosave int 1.0

Change the autosave threshold for the install command


Default value is: 1024.
context String 1.0 Deprecated.

deprecated in comment


Default value is: /.
User property is: vlt.context.
debug boolean 1.0

prints parameter values


User property is: vlt.debug.
deploy boolean 1.0

Set to true to enable deployment of artifacts during integration-test phase


User property is: vlt.deploy.
force boolean 1.0

Force upload of packages if they already exist in the target environment
host String 1.0

Hostname for the CQ server


Default value is: localhost.
User property is: vlt.host.
https boolean 1.0

Whether to use an SSL connection instead of a normal HTTP connection. Does not affect the configured TCP port


User property is: vlt.https.
noProxy boolean 1.0

Set to true to completely disable HTTP proxy connections for this plugin. Overrides any other HTTP proxy configuration


User property is: vlt.proxy.noProxy.
packageDependencies List 1.0

List of artifactIds matching dependencies that are valid vault packages
pass String 1.0 Deprecated.

(Since version scala.this.deprecated.init$default$2) deprecated in annotation


Default value is: admin.
User property is: vlt.pass.
port Integer 1.0

TCP Port for the CQ server


Default value is: 4502.
User property is: vlt.port.
proxyHost String 1.0

The HTTP Proxy hostname


Default value is: localhost.
User property is: vlt.proxy.host.
proxyPass String 1.0

The HTTP Proxy password


User property is: vlt.proxy.pass.
proxyPort int 1.0

The HTTP Proxy port. Set to -1 to use the default proxy port.


User property is: vlt.proxy.port.
proxyProtocol String 1.0

The HTTP Proxy protocol


Default value is: http.
User property is: vlt.proxy.protocol.
proxySet boolean 1.0

Set to true to override the proxy configuration in the user's Maven Settings with the associated mojo parameter alternatives


User property is: vlt.proxy.set.
proxyUser String 1.0

The HTTP Proxy username


User property is: vlt.proxy.user.
recursive boolean 1.0

Set to false to not install any subpackages that might be embedded within each dependency


Default value is: true.
skip boolean 1.0

Set to true to skip execution of this mojo


User property is: vlt.skip.upload-dependencies.
user String 1.0 (no description)
Default value is: admin.
User property is: vlt.user.

Parameter Details

autosave:

Change the autosave threshold for the install command

  • Type: int
  • Since: 1.0
  • Required: No
  • Default: 1024

context:

Deprecated.

deprecated in comment

CQ Servlet context by which JCR paths are appended

  • Type: java.lang.String
  • Since: 1.0
  • Required: No
  • User Property: vlt.context
  • Default: /

debug:

prints parameter values

  • Type: boolean
  • Since: 1.0
  • Required: No
  • User Property: vlt.debug

deploy:

Set to true to enable deployment of artifacts during integration-test phase

  • Type: boolean
  • Since: 1.0
  • Required: No
  • User Property: vlt.deploy

force:

Force upload of packages if they already exist in the target environment

  • Type: boolean
  • Since: 1.0
  • Required: No

host:

Hostname for the CQ server

  • Type: java.lang.String
  • Since: 1.0
  • Required: No
  • User Property: vlt.host
  • Default: localhost

https:

Whether to use an SSL connection instead of a normal HTTP connection. Does not affect the configured TCP port

  • Type: boolean
  • Since: 1.0
  • Required: No
  • User Property: vlt.https

noProxy:

Set to true to completely disable HTTP proxy connections for this plugin. Overrides any other HTTP proxy configuration

  • Type: boolean
  • Since: 1.0
  • Required: No
  • User Property: vlt.proxy.noProxy

packageDependencies:

List of artifactIds matching dependencies that are valid vault packages

  • Type: java.util.List
  • Since: 1.0
  • Required: No

pass:

Deprecated.

(Since version scala.this.deprecated.init$default$2) deprecated in annotation

Password to use in connection credentials

  • Type: java.lang.String
  • Since: 1.0
  • Required: No
  • User Property: vlt.pass
  • Default: admin

port:

TCP Port for the CQ server

  • Type: java.lang.Integer
  • Since: 1.0
  • Required: No
  • User Property: vlt.port
  • Default: 4502

proxyHost:

The HTTP Proxy hostname

  • Type: java.lang.String
  • Since: 1.0
  • Required: No
  • User Property: vlt.proxy.host
  • Default: localhost

proxyPass:

The HTTP Proxy password

  • Type: java.lang.String
  • Since: 1.0
  • Required: No
  • User Property: vlt.proxy.pass

proxyPort:

The HTTP Proxy port. Set to -1 to use the default proxy port.

  • Type: int
  • Since: 1.0
  • Required: No
  • User Property: vlt.proxy.port

proxyProtocol:

The HTTP Proxy protocol

  • Type: java.lang.String
  • Since: 1.0
  • Required: No
  • User Property: vlt.proxy.protocol
  • Default: http

proxySet:

Set to true to override the proxy configuration in the user's Maven Settings with the associated mojo parameter alternatives

  • Type: boolean
  • Since: 1.0
  • Required: No
  • User Property: vlt.proxy.set

proxyUser:

The HTTP Proxy username

  • Type: java.lang.String
  • Since: 1.0
  • Required: No
  • User Property: vlt.proxy.user

recursive:

Set to false to not install any subpackages that might be embedded within each dependency

  • Type: boolean
  • Since: 1.0
  • Required: No
  • Default: true

skip:

Set to true to skip execution of this mojo

  • Type: boolean
  • Since: 1.0
  • Required: No
  • User Property: vlt.skip.upload-dependencies

user:

(no description)
  • Type: java.lang.String
  • Since: 1.0
  • Required: No
  • User Property: vlt.user
  • Default: admin
